lead_paragraph: The start of the Louis Vuitton Cup was postponed yesterday because of inconsistent wind off Valencia, Spain. They will try to race today, but yesterday’s 10 match races were rescheduled for Friday. Alinghi of Switzerland will defend the America’s Cup from June 23 to July 4 against the winning boat.
